definition: prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Prime Minister Ted Heath takes Britain into the European Community
sentences.chinese: 1973年希思首相把英国带入欧洲共同体。

sentences.english: The president dispatched a messenger to tell the premier what happened.
sentences.chinese: 总统派出一名信使向首相禀报所发生的事。

sentences.english: Blame was attached upon Prime Minister Laughton's Cabinet for yielding to the Russians.
sentences.chinese: 劳顿首相的内阁因向俄国人屈服而受到责难。

sentences.english: Currently only Jordan's king has that right.
sentences.chinese: 目前仅约旦国王有任命首相的权力。

sentences.english: Ms Blears pointedly refused to say a good word about the prime minister as she resigned.
sentences.chinese: 她在离任时曾很决绝的拒绝对首相发表一句赞美之词。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister guides the state.
The teerist kidnaps prime minister and asks government for five million ransom money .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子绑架了首相，并向政府要了五百万的赎金。

sentences.english: British Prime Minister Benjamin Disraeli is believed to have been the first to use the phrase.
sentences.chinese: 英国首相迪斯雷利被认为是被首先使用的短语。

sentences.english: The prime minister would go to any lengths to keep his government in power.
sentences.chinese: 首相会竭尽全力务使他的政府能继续执政。

sentences.english: Most of all, the prime minister can thank his long-serving team of advisers and fixers .
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是首相要感谢顾问团队及调停者的不懈努力。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown's summer holiday in Dorset lasted just four hours.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天布朗首相去多西特度假仅在那待了四个小时。

sentences.english: Japan'sPrime Minister- designate is completing his Cabinet today.
sentences.chinese: 日本的当选首相今日将完成组阁。

sentences.english: Will Chinese leaders consider holding the first meeting with Prime Minister Noda?
sentences.chinese: 中国领导人是否考虑与野田首相举行首次会晤？

sentences.english: The prime minister of japan changed again this week.
sentences.chinese: 本周日本首相再度易人，鸠山下台，菅直人上台。

sentences.english: West Tian Chang Division requires removal of the former Prime Minister Naoto Kan, the original position.
sentences.chinese: 西田昌司要求首相菅直人撤除前原的职务。

sentences.english: Leo Blair was the first child born to a serving British prime minister for 150 years.
sentences.chinese: 这是150年来首个在唐宁街首相府出生的孩子。

definition: Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Prince KONOE Fumimaro (1891-), Japanese nobleman and militarist politician, prime minister 1937-1939 and 1940-1941
formal title of the Japanese prime minister
pinyin: Nei4 ge2 Zong3 li3 Da4 chen2

definition: Abe Shinzo (1954-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2006-2007 and from 2012
Roosevelt (name)/Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919), US President 1901-1909/Franklin D. Roosevelt (1882-1945), US President 1933-1945
